Detailed Description

This class implements the node of the GHTree. Since the GHTree is based on hiperplanes, this node holds one or two objects, the distance between them, and the left and right links to the children nodes.

Version
1.0
Author
Ives Rene Venturini Pola (ives@.nosp@m.icmc.nosp@m..usp..nosp@m.br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef struct stGHNode::GHNodeEntry stGHNode::stGHNodeEntry

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

stGHNode::stGHNode ( stPage *  page,
bool  create = false 
)

Creates a new instance of this class. The parameter page is an instance of stPage that hold the node data.

The parameter create tells to stPage what operation will be performed. True means that the page will be initialized and false means that the page will be used just as it is. The default value is false.

Parameters
pageThe page that hold the data of this node.
createThe operation to be performed.

const stByte *  object 
)

This method adds an object to this node.

Parameters
sizeThe size of the object in bytes.
objectThe object data.
Returns
The position in the vector Entries or a negative value for failure.

const stByte* stGHNode::GetObject ( stCount  idx)

Gets the serialized object. Use GetObjectSize to determine the size of the object.

Parameters
idThe id of the entry.
Warning
The parameter id is not verified by this implementation unless stDEBUG is defined at compile time.
